      • parseRGB

        public static int[] parseRGB(java.lang.String rgb)
        Parses an RGB string in the format "r,g,b" into an array of integers.
        Parameters:
        rgb - The RGB string.
        Returns:
        An array containing the red, green, and blue components.

      • fromAngleAndMagnitude

        public static PVector fromAngleAndMagnitude(float angle,
                                            float magnitude)
        Creates a PVector from an angle in radians and scales it by a given factor.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle in radians.
        magnitude - The scaling factor.
        Returns:
        A new PVector pointing in the direction of the angle, scaled by the magnitude.

      • map

        public static float map(float value,
                        float start1,
                        float stop1,
                        float start2,
                        float stop2)
        Maps a value from one range to another.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be scaled.
        start1 - The start of the first range.
        stop1 - The end of the first range.
        start2 - The start of the second range.
        stop2 - The end of the second range.
        Returns:
        The mapped value.

      • updateImageColor

        public static void updateImageColor(PImage image,
                                    int color)
        Updates the color of an image of pixels.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to be updated.
        color - The new color.

      • distance

        public static float distance(PVector p1,
                             PVector p2)
        Calculates the distance between two points.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The first point.
        p2 - The second point.
        Returns:
        The distance between the two points.
